```{r libs}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```


```{r load}
load(here("assets/clean_data/clean_data.rds"))
```


```{r count}
count_sum <- function(x){
  
  stopifnot(is.factor(x))
  
  
  fct_count(x) %>% 
    mutate(Percent = n/sum(n)*100,
         `Cumulative Frequency` = cumsum(n),
         `Cumulative Percent` = cumsum(Percent))
}

map(clean_data, count_sum)
```
